com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface GeoCoordinateAdapter<GC>

  • Type Parameters:
    GC - The type that can provide latitude/longitude
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapQuadGeoCoordinateAdapter

    public interface GeoCoordinateAdapter<GC>
    Extracts latitude and longitude for some type.

    Its usage is optional when using types that implement GeoCoordinateHolder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getLatitude(GC instance) 
      double getLongitude(GC instance) 

    • Method Detail

      • getLatitude

        double getLatitude(GC instance)
        Returns:
        Latitude in degrees of the given instance of GC

      • getLongitude

        double getLongitude(GC instance)
        Returns:
        Longitude in degrees of the given instance of GC
